conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand the layout and flow of liquid through the baffles.
The image shows a layout with points A, B, C where liquid will flow out, and containers D, E with baffles positioned between them.
Liquid flows out from points A, B, and C.
The baffles are positioned to direct the flow of liquid.
From A, the liquid flows through the baffle and into container D.
From B, the liquid flows through the baffle and into container E.
From C, the liquid flows through the baffle and into container D.
Liquid from A and C will flow into D, while liquid from B will flow into E.
